body.p: An mdoc manual is divided into two logical parts: the prologue and the document body.
body.pre: .\" Prologue follows: .Dd May 26 2011 .Dt MDOC 7 .Os .\" Document body follows: .Sh NAME .Nm mdoc .Nd mdoc language reference .Sh DESCRIPTION The .Nm mdoc language is used to format .Bx .Ux manuals.
body.p: The prologue specifies information regarding the manual's classification. For the most part, this information does not change over the course of development.
The document body consists of the documentation content. This material will change over the course of development.
